titles.title: To amend title 28, United States Code, to provide an additional place for holding court in the Southern District of New York.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Courts and Intellectual Property.

bill.summary: 3/3/1995--Introduced. Amends the Federal judicial code to provide an additional place, in or near the town of Walkill, for holding court in the Southern District of New York.
